text.section:
The Board may:
Recommend regulations for adoption by the Secretary to carry out the provisions of this title; and
Make inquiries and conduct an investigation regarding any applicant for a license.

The Board shall:
Carry out the provisions of this title;
Collect and account for the fees provided for under this title; and
Keep a current record of all individuals and entities licensed under this title, including:
The names of individuals and entities that are licensed;
The issuance and expiration dates of the licenses; and
Any other information that the Board considers appropriate.
